hero_title: Secure the Best Funding for Your Small Business
hero_subtitle: Since 2016, Core Business Capital has helped thousands secure SBA Loans, Term Loans, and more across all 50 states.

services.title: Our Financing Programs
services.sba_desc: Our U.S. SBA Loans provide government-backed funding up to $5 million for small businesses in Colorado and nationwide, with competitive rates and flexible terms since 2016. Ideal for expansion, real estate, or working capital needs.
services.term_desc: Our Term Loans offer fixed-rate financing from $10,000 to $500,000 for small business growth, equipment purchase, or debt consolidation, available to businesses across all 50 states with fast approval processes.
services.equipment_desc: Secure Equipment Financing tailored for small businesses in Denver, Colorado, and beyond, allowing you to acquire essential machinery without upfront costs, with terms up to 84 months and rates starting low.
services.line_desc: Access revolving Lines of Credit up to $250,000 for ongoing working capital needs, perfect for seasonal fluctuations or unexpected expenses for small businesses nationwide, drawn as needed since our founding in 2016.
services.working_desc: Our Working Capital Loans provide quick cash infusions from $5,000 to $100,000 to cover day-to-day operations, inventory, or payroll for small businesses in Colorado and all US states, with minimal documentation.
services.payroll_desc: Ensure smooth operations with Payroll Financing solutions that advance funds against future receivables, helping small businesses meet payroll deadlines without stress, available nationwide with our expert guidance.
services.cash_desc: Get immediate Business Cash Advances based on daily credit card sales or revenue, up to $500,000, for urgent needs like marketing or repairs, with no fixed repayments—ideal for Colorado small businesses and beyond.
services.invoice_desc: Unlock cash from unpaid invoices with our Invoice Financing program, factoring up to 90% of invoice value instantly for small businesses waiting on payments, serving clients in all 50 states since 2016.
